FuncDef:
The radius-server group command binds a RADIUS server group to a dynamic address pool.
The undo radius-server group command unbinds a RADIUS server group from a dynamic address pool.
By default, a dynamic address pool does not have any RADIUS server group bound.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a RADIUS server group for a dynamic address pool.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters, which can be uppercase letters A to Z, lowercase letters a to z, digits 0 to 9, periods (.), hyphens (-), or underscores (_).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a dynamic address pool is configured, run the radius-server group command to bind a RADIUS server group to the dynamic address pool so that dynamic address segments can be delivered.
Precautions
The RADIUS server group to be bound to the dynamic address pool must have been configured.
